item.title: Building your Standard Operating Procedures
item.description: Great services are build by amazing teams and strong processes adf Build your business rhythm adf Build your remote culture, pick your tools and use them adsf Get honest feedback with retrospectives afd Mix it up now and again adf Try to see each other once in a while adf Good Luck!
